OrgName.entry: INFIELD LANE FLORAL AND HORTICULTURAL SOCIETY

Desc.entry: Private allotments available to rent with water supply. Applications invited, but there may be a short waiting list. Will consider small animals by application. Allotment holders can grow fruit trees in addition to cultivating flowers or vegetables. Also has available a community allotment with a large polytunnel, 6 raised beds and 12 fruit trees available to community groups on application. Limited on-site parking and shop. Families especially welcome.
